short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract email addresses from the currently opened page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Email extractor is a powerful tool that allows you to extract email addresses from any website or page with just a single clicks. With this extension, you can quickly and easily collect email addresses for marketing campaigns, lead generation, or research purposes. The extension also provides the ability to download the extracted emails as TXT or CSV files or copy them to your clipboard.


Features:
- Extract email addresses from any website or page
- Download extracted emails as TXT or CSV files
- Copy extracted emails to your clipboard
- Easy-to-use interface with a simple, intuitive design
- Lightweight and fast, without compromising on performance
- No limit on the number of emails that can be extracted


Overall, our email extractor browser extension provides an easy and efficient way to extract email addresses from any website or page. With its user-friendly interface and robust features, it is a must-have tool for anyone looking to collect email addresses for any purpose.
